article.title: BAE to Support Radar Systems
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: BAE Systems Technology Solutions and Services Incorporated, Rockville, Maryland, is being awarded an approximate $7 million firm-fixed-price, cost-reimbursable, cost-plus-fixed-fee, and fixed-price-incentive-fee contract for the Instrumentation Radar Support Program that provides engineering, logistics, and maintenance support for various instrumentation ranges belonging to 24 ranges (foreign and domestic).Â The 45 Contracting Squadron, Patrick Air Force Base, Florida, is the contracting activity.
